name: タップ De ぷる萌え！ 亜美宮のえみ
summary:
寂れた貧乏神社で働く巫女さん。
あまりの暇さに「賽銭箱の監視」という業務に就いている。
--
She is a priestess at a deserted shrine.
So much free time,she has nothing but monitor
the offertory box.
Be sure not to miss!

With one tap she trembles and she moans softly.
You can also use your finger to make her do as you wish!

Extra stage included
Please mind the sound.
Android 2.2 or later.
Requires Adobe AIR.
info:
